lines.text: It looks like a zoo in Hell!
[first lines]
Morning!
Morning. Taxi?
All that remains of Corbin is a few harmless objects in the cellar.
Whatever happened to my father will not happen to me.
It's already happening.
All that I can see... is horror.
Father has never allowed me to go on the heath.
[on being asked to visit and treat Letitia Witley]
Nobody in the village recommended me, I'm sure of that.
But, Steve, no one ever goes into the greenhouse at night!
I've seen a glow like that once before - in a radiation lab.
I see it, but I don't believe it!
The scent in here - it's so sweet, it's sickening!
It's the scent of decay.
It's only the wind.
Mr. Witley, blasphemy had nothing to do with it.
Something dreadful's going to happen, I know it!
[last lines]
C'mon, let's get out of here.
